definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: So, we think that the DINK trend is a good phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们认为，“丁客家族”趋势是一个好的现象。

definition: "leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
to marry and give birth late
to go and live with one's wife's family, in effect becoming a member of her family
to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
If you marry a chicken, follow the chicken (idiom); A woman should follow whatever her husband orders./We must learn to accept the people around us.
to get married right after graduation
formal betrothal (in which the boy's family sends presents to the girl's family)
to take a wife/to get married (man)
